pullRequest.title: Quarkus based HTTP protocol adapter
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR is dependent on #2090 and #2091
To test it out you can build Hono with
mvn clean install -Pbuild-docker-image
for JVM, or
mvn clean install -Pbuild-docker-image -Pnative
for native image.
There's a branch in packages project that can be used for testing (this can be merged once we merge Hono changes)
https://github.com/dejanb/packages/tree/hono-quarkus
Simply, build the package
helm package --dependency-update hono
and run it
helm install -n hono -f hono/profileQuarkus.yaml eclipse-hono ./hono-1.3.15.tgz
for JVM image, or
helm install -n hono -f hono/profileQuarkusNative.yaml eclipse-hono ./hono-1.3.15.tgz
for the native one.
Note that this is the basis for the Quarkus support. There's still some things to implement and fix, but hopefully we can base all the future work on this.

nodes.bodyText: can we add <name>, <description> and <url> as we do in other modules?
these should already be inherited from the parent POM ...
this is already a managed dependency, do not override version
this is already a managed dependency, do not override version

this is already a managed dependency, do not override version
IMHO we should also include the Micrometer registry implementation by means of profiles as we do in the other adapters
are we depending on any SNAPSHOTs?
this is a managed dependency, do not override the version ...
the version of the failsafe plugin is also managed, do not override the version, if not required
this is a managed dependency, no need to specify the version

nodes.bodyText: FMPOV we should move the definition of the quarkus and Jandex plugins to the parent POM where we also define the other commonly used plugins. WDYT?

I meant to move it to the <pluginManagement> section in order to define the versions and config.
We then still need to include the plugins in the ` sectionof the modules that should run them but can then omit the version and config ...
FMPOV we do not need this
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,220 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<project xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd" xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.eclipse.hono</groupId>
+    <artifactId>hono-adapters</artifactId>
+    <version>1.4.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+  <artifactId>hono-adapter-http-vertx-quarkus</artifactId>
+  <name>Hono HTTP Adapter</name>
+
+  <description>A protocol adapter exposing Hono's Telemetry & Event APIs via HTTP.</description>
+  <url>https://www.eclipse.org/hono</url>
+
+  <properties>
+    <quarkus.container-image.group>eclipse</quarkus.container-image.group>
+    <quarkus.platform.artifact-id>quarkus-bom</quarkus.platform.artifact-id>
+    <quarkus.platform.group-id>io.quarkus</quarkus.platform.group-id>
+    <surefire-plugin.version>2.22.1</surefire-plugin.version>

nodes.bodyText: you could even add the <execution> configuration here as it is the same for all modules, right?
